column5: This is a lovely mid-rise situated in the heart of Houston's Medical Center. This modern living space is ideal for those who simply want a weekend getaway or for those who want to enjoy Houston's main attraction Super Bowl 51. If the Super Bowl is what brings you in town and you're looking for convenience and luxury, then this is a prime location for you.   *Hobby Airport pick up/drop off is available
column8: Modern Midrise in Houston's Medical Center
